queries.query: SELECT T.ticket_id, M.movie_title, S.schedule_start_time FROM Tickets T JOIN cinema_infos ci ON ci.cinema_info_id = T.cinema_info_id JOIN Users U ON T.user_id = U.user_id JOIN Schedules S ON S.schedule_id = ci.schedule_id JOIN Movies M ON M.movie_id = s.movie_id WHERE T.user_id = ?;

SELECT T.ticket_id, U.user_nickname , M.movie_title, S.schedule_start_time , SE.seat_number FROM Tickets T JOIN Users U ON T.user_id = U.user_id JOIN Cinema_Infos CI ON T.cinema_info_id = CI.cinema_info_id JOIN Schedules S ON CI.schedule_id = S.schedule_id JOIN Movies M ON s.movie_id = M.movie_id JOIN Seats SE ON CI.seat_id = SE.seat_id WHERE T.ticket_id = ?;
